title: Monster
writer: Colen C. Wiley, Janece Shaffer, Walter Dean Myers
short_cast: Kelvin Harrison Jr., Jennifer Hudson, Jeffrey Wright, Jennifer Ehle, Tim Blake Nelson, Nasir 'Nas' Jones, Rakim Mayers, Paul Ben-Victor, John David Washington, Jharrel Jerome, Dorian Missick
cast: Kelvin Harrison Jr., Jennifer Hudson, Jeffrey Wright, Jennifer Ehle, Tim Blake Nelson, Nasir 'Nas' Jones, Rakim Mayers, Paul Ben-Victor, John David Washington, Jharrel Jerome, Dorian Missick

desc: A talented teen implicated in a robbery-turned-murder fights for his innocence and integrity against a criminal justice system that’s already judged him.
